title: Yorick is going to get nerfed.
body:
He was played in the EU LCS today. There was a slight problem however,
-No escapes
-No outplays, all point and click
-Most importantly: Even less #lcsbigplays than hecarim, who will probably also get nerfed because he isn't on lee sin's big play level.

He is already friends with urgot, azir, olaf, and veigar. I wonder how far down he will go. :(

replies.body: I didn't actually see that game, But did Yorick even win the game?
They wouldn't nerf him. They have an upcoming rework that will take place in about 10~ years, give or take.
Yorick was also used in World's S3 and never got nerfed. His rework kit has been in the making for ages now.
they wil turn him into bard
